title: Elevator
guest_stars: Judy Tenuta, Timothy Leary, Ashley Judd
synopsis: Self-proclaimed goddess of the galaxy Judy Tenuta and Space Ghost decide to visit the Elvis Chapel in Las Vegas. Space Ghost also talks with Dr. Timothy Leary, a man branded by Nixon as "the most dangerous man alive." Then, it's tacos for everybody, even actress Ashley Judd.

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set) Greetings! I am Space Ghost. Welcome to the show. Appearing with us on this episode will be the comedienne Judy Tenuta, and the dissident Dr. Timothy Leary. Say hello to my band, Zorak and the Original Way Outs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let's get started! Please welcome stand-up comedienne Judy Tenuta!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to my show, Citizen Tenuta!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: (in falsetto voice) Oh, hello!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How was the transport to the Ghost Planet? Are you comfortable?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I would be a lot more comfy if I could sit on you, Space Ghost! (plays accordion) You should be my furniture!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blushes, laughs nervously) Um, Judy, what is your true form? Tell me your secret identity.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! Then it would not be a secret! Come clo-o-oser to the goddess, and I will tell you (Space Ghost scoots closer) No! Not that close! You cannot possess me! (he scoots back) No! O-o-o-oh! I am the Goddess of the Galaxy! (plays accordion) Also known as (voice change) Rue McClanahan!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes! The Golden Girls! I love the one where they all eat contaminated Geritol and die!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, that's not one of their episodes!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Well, it should have been.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Judy, what sort of super-powers do you possess?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Sometimes I get possessed, I get possessed by others, like Cher! Oh no, here she comes! (doing Cher impression, sings) "Ohhh, if I could turn back time..." (romantic music swells in background) What does that do for you, Space Ghost? (she winks, her eye sparkles)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I see you have your accordion. I command you to play it!

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! The Goddess does not take orders! No! Take that back, take that back! Get on your knees and beg me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, I think not.

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Okay, I'll do a song for you now. (plays accordion and sings:)Ohhhh! I love Space Ghost,He's a hot stud, yeah...Polka!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Judy, tell me, is there anything you admire about me?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Oh, Space Ghost, I love it that you are invisible, and that you don't eat my food, because you're a cartoon character, you know, like my big fat roommate Blowsanne! (does Roseanne voice) Hey, Judy, hey, I want that donut 'n stuff! (makes raspberry sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It sounds like you have many friends. Do people want to be your friend because you're so famous?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, you must remember one thing: friends are just enemies who don't have the guts to kill you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Judy, are friends just enemies who don't have the guts to kill you?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Yes! Friends are just enemies who don't have the guts to kill you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen, are you ever going to play Vegas?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: That's right, and I'm engaged to Sigfried and Roy, and I get to be the husband! It could happen! (plays accordion)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Maybe you and I could go to Vegas, visit the Elvis chapel?

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! That could happen, my hormones are slam dancin'! I think I have to sing about it! (plays accordion and sings:)Space Ghost, Space Ghost,He's got muscles that you can't see,Space Ghost, Space Ghost,And he can count to three,Space Gho-o-ost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: She digs me! (flies through ceiling into space)

transcript.speaker: Judy Tenuta
transcript.dialogue: Can you handle it, hog? (she disappears from monitor)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Is he gone?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Let's get out of here!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Jack!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How are the kids, Jack? (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (lands on floor in studio) Ouch! Where'd everybody go?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in elevator) He's pathetic! (laughs with Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hello? I've got to find these guys! (flies back into space) We'll be back after a word from our sponsor.
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hums to himself) All right! We're back. As you know, I got my start in show business doing action adventure. To keep with that tradition, I have a few rare clips that Moltar has found back in the vault. The good people of Earth call them "blooters."

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: That's bloopers, Space Fool!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bloopers.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, how I hate you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Acknowledged. Now, there are some days when it seems like nothing goes right. Roll the clip.

transcript.speaker: Director
transcript.dialogue: Cut! Space Ghost! That was my car!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oops! Sorry, Mr. Landis.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (puts his hand over his face) Moltar, stop! I am embarrassed!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Too bad! (continues to laugh, rolls next clip)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (on blooper reel) (blasting with destructo ray) Hey, how do you turn these things off? Unplug me! Unplug me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Enough, you fiend! Cut it out!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, can I ask you something?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Why are you so stupid? (laughs with Moltar)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Stupid? Who was waiting for you clowns when you got off the elevator?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You were.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty! Our next guest has been called Uncle Tim, the guru of psychedelic utopians. Please welcome citizen Dr. Timothy Leary! (Dr. Leary appears on monitor) Welcome to the show, Dr. Leary. Do you have enough oxygen?

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: (talks but no sound comes out) (Zorak laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, turn on his mike!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Whuh oh! (throws switch to turn on microphone)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We all make mistakes, just make that your last, Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, whatever. (laughs) (Space Ghost blasts him) Aaagh!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) (Space Ghost blasts him, too) No!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Now Timothy, tell me, what's your secret identity?

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: I'm an outlaw, I'm a, a counter-culture person, and that's where I like to be, out there on the, on the front lines, uh, with my friends.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What sort of super-powers do you possess?

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: Oh, we flood your eyeballs, over, overload your, uh, your earballs, I give you patterns and swirls of color, and, uh, makin' you feel better and better, yeah, the power of using light to, uh, to enhance consciousness and alter consciousness is the tricks I'm using now, and, so far, they're legal, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Now, Tim, people depend on me to defend their planets and save millions of innocent lives from impending doom. What do you feel people expect from you?

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Richard Nixon called me -- I'm proud of this, Space Ghost -- he called me the most dangerous man alive, and of course, I tried to be as dangerous to him as I could be. Outsiders, uh, like me a lot because I've given the man fits, so I've got a lot of friends out there.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let me ask you one thing: are friends just enemies who... um, anyway, I fly, you don't.

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm a super-hero, you're not.

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: It's alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You must be in awe of my extraordinary powers.

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: I agree, uh, you're my idol, and I hope in my next, uh, incarnation I'll, I'll be floatin' up there with you, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, whatever. Thanks, Tim, come see us again, won't you?

transcript.speaker: Timothy Leary
transcript.dialogue: Oh no... (image fades away)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay! That's it! Let's go get some tacos!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Alright! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! You have an incoming transmission. (control room monitor displays a TBS logo, followed by a graphic reading "HERE IS WHAT WE DO!" with a smiley face button. Announcer on the monitor says "Here is what we do.")

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well? Who is it?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's Ashley Judd, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ashley Judd? I thought she was next week! Alright, put her through. I'm famished! Greetings, Ashley, we're hungry! Would you like to run out and get us some tacos?

transcript.speaker: Ashley Judd
transcript.dialogue: Not particularly.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well then, could you whip us up some?

transcript.speaker: Ashley Judd
transcript.dialogue: I can bake really good chocolate pies.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tacos, Ashley, tacos. You know, Mexican. We're out of here, you're welcome to join us at the Taco Bonito. Zorak, on the one!

transcript.speaker: Ashley Judd
transcript.dialogue: I can bake really good chocolate pies.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (hums) So, anyone watch "Seinfeld" last night?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Was it a repeat?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: There's something on your cape.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Has it been there all night?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's... not that noticeable. (ding!) (door opens, somebody steps in)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How ya doin'?

transcript.speaker: Person
transcript.dialogue: Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good, good, good. (ding!) (ding!) (ding!) (ding!) Zorak, are you sure you know where this restaurant is?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes! (door opens) Oops, wrong floor. I... think it's the next one.
